recipesJson.name: Snickerdoodle Custard
recipesJson.author: CenCalVape
recipesJson.description: A cinnamon spiced cookie in some thick vanilla custard. If you like chewy, dense snickerdoodle cookies, then you gotta try it in custard form.

reviews.text: i still haven't made this but i know its good
Love this stuff! My wife loves a plain snickerdoodle cookie but this one just does it for me. Thanks for sharing!
Really like this recipe man. I keep it in rotation with my ADV. Keep up the good work!
One of the top 5 recipes I have ever made. This tastes absolutely amazing! I tried with normal sweetener instead at .5 percent and it was delicious. Vaped 300ml already!
Banging as a S'V, 30 ml won't last me the steep time...
